title: The Purse
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover and Patricia Watson
brief_description: Deals with the conscience or the lack of it, and what one or the other makes us do. An elderly woman finds a purse on a bus. She takes it home and discovers it contains some money. The woman who lost the purse collects insurance. the quetsion raised is does circumstance excuse taking what is not ours.
